title: World bank
creator_credit: James Lipscomb and United States Information Agency
brief_description: How the World bank plays a major role in helping countries to modernise is dramatised in this film. An official of the bank makes a trip to a country to make certain that the request for a $21 million loan to build a highway will indeed help to develop the area and really benefit the people of the country.
